verses.verse: Oh clap <S%H8628><s%> your hands, <S%H3709><s%> all you nations. <S%H5971><s%> Shout <S%H7321><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of triumph! <S%H7440><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> Most High <S%H5945><s%> is awesome. <S%H3372><s%> He is a great <S%H1419><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> over all the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He subdues <S%H1696><s%> nations <S%H5971><s%> under us, <S%H5971><s%> and peoples under our feet. <S%H7272><s%>
He chooses <S%H977><s%> our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> for us, <S%H1347><s%> the glory of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> whom he loved. <S%H157><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> has gone up <S%H5927><s%> with a shout, <S%H8643><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a trumpet. <S%H7782><s%>
Sing praise <S%H2167><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> sing praises. <S%H2167><s%> Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to our King, <S%H4428><s%> sing praises. <S%H2167><s%>
For God <S%H430><s%> is the King <S%H4428><s%> of all the earth. <S%H776><s%> Sing praises <S%H2167><s%> with understanding. <S%H7919><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> reigns <S%H4427><s%> over the nations. <S%H1471><s%> God <S%H430><s%> sits <S%H3427><s%> on his holy <S%H6944><s%> throne. <S%H3678><s%>

The princes <S%H5081><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> are gathered together, <S%H622><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham. <S%H85><s%> For the shields <S%H4043><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> belong to God. <S%H430><s%> He is greatly <S%H3966><s%> exalted! <S%H5927><s%>
